mapper.select: SELECT t.orderId, t.orderSeq, SUM (t.actualQty) AS actualQty FROM t_sms_sendcargo_entry t WHERE t.parent = #{parent} GROUP BY t.orderId, t.orderSeq

SELECT t.id, t.supplier, t.number, e.id AS entryId, e.seq, e.orderId, e.orderSeq, e.material, e.lot, e.dyBatchNum, e.code, e.price, e.unit, e.qty, e.dyProDate, e.dyManufacturer, e.registrationNo, e.effectiveDate, e.amount, e.actualQty, o.id AS orderEntryId, t.type FROM t_sms_sendcargo t INNER JOIN t_sms_sendcargo_entry e ON t.id = e.parent INNER JOIN t_sms_purchase_order_entry o ON e.orderId = o.parent AND e.orderSeq = o.seq WHERE t.id = #{id}
SELECT * FROM t_sms_sendcargo_entry t WHERE t.id = #{id}
